books.title: All Fours
books.author: Miranda July
books.description: A semi-famous artist announces her plan to drive cross-country, from LA to NY.

books.description: A novel exploring the complexities of beauty and identity in contemporary society.

books.title: Black River

books.description: A gripping tale set along the banks of a mysterious river, delving into human nature and survival.

books.title: Bluff: Poems

books.description: A collection of powerful poems addressing themes of identity, love, and resilience.

books.title: The Book of Love

books.description: An anthology of short stories that explore the many facets of love, both real and fantastical.

books.title: The Bright Sword: A Novel of King Arthur
books.author: Lev Grossman
books.description: A fresh retelling of the King Arthur tale, blending history and fantasy.

books.title: The Coin
books.author: Yasmin Zaher
books.description: A wealthy, eccentric Palestinian woman moves to New York City and becomes entangled in a bag-selling scheme.

books.title: Colored Television
books.author: Danzy Senna
books.description: A struggling L.A. novelist turns to TV writing, leading to unexpected challenges and self-discovery.

books.title: Creation Lake
books.author: Rachel Kushner
books.description: A novel exploring the intersections of art, politics, and personal relationships.

books.title: Dead in Long Beach, California

books.description: A compelling narrative set in Long Beach, delving into themes of community and personal identity.

books.title: The Empusium: A Health Resort Horror Story

books.description: A chilling tale set in a health resort, blending horror with psychological insight.

books.title: The Familiar
books.author: Leigh Bardugo
books.description: A novel that intertwines the lives of several characters, exploring themes of magic and destiny.

books.title: A Film in Which I Play Everyone: Poems

books.description: A collection of poems that explore identity and the multiplicity of the self.

books.title: Forest of Noise: Poems

books.description: Poems reflecting on nature, conflict, and the human experience.

books.title: Funny Story
books.author: Emily Henry
books.description: A buttoned-up librarian falls for her new roommate in a complicated yet cozy romance.

books.title: Ghostroots: Stories

books.description: A collection of stories blending the supernatural with everyday life.

books.title: Godwin

books.description: A novel exploring the complexities of modern life and personal relationships.

books.title: Good Material
books.author: Dolly Alderton
books.description: A witty and insightful look at relationships and the material things that define us.

books.title: Great Expectations
books.author: Vinson Cunningham
books.description: A modern retelling of the classic tale, set in contemporary America.

books.title: Headshot

books.title: The Hunter

books.description: A suspenseful thriller that delves into the dark side of human nature.

books.title: Intermezzo

books.description: A poignant novel examining the complexities of relationships and personal growth.

books.title: James

books.description: A collection of poems exploring themes of service, identity, and place.

books.title: The Safekeep

books.description: A novel exploring themes of memory, loss, and the passage of time.

books.title: The Sequel

books.description: A novel about the challenges and surprises of writing a follow-up to a successful debut.

books.title: Shred Sisters

books.description: A story of friendship, music, and the complexities of creative collaboration.

books.title: Connie

books.description: A memoir by the renowned journalist, reflecting on her career and personal life.

books.title: The Pairing

books.description: A romantic novel exploring the dynamics of a relationship
